name: Reality (VR) - (MAJOR DEMO)
description:
Welcome to the game of Reality. Reality is a VR experience/game where you go through a time in different offices and many different immersive interactive experiences. There are things such as working computers, paper and pen, and working candles. There are semi-realistic graphics and very fun interactions. Have fun exploring the world.

**Warning**

This project is a heavy demo. This was done for a course and it is not finished. There are only two of the offices available and a couple of bugs. This project will be picked up later;
